title: Студент установил слежку за Илоном Маском и попросил взамен взять его на работу
description: В сети набирает популярность история о том, как студент-первокурсник Джек Суини создал бота, отслеживающего перемещение джета Илона Маска.

title: Elon Musk acaba da dar un golpe al sector de los vehículos eléctricos con estos comentarios
description: Hace seis meses, Elon Musk comentó que dejaría de asistir a reuniones telefónicas con inversionistas a menos que tuviera "algo importante" por decir. Y debió haberse apegado a ese plan.

title: The future is now: After nine years, it’s time to say goodbye to the BMW i3
description: After a production run of nine years and more than 250,000 units sold, the BMW i3, BMW’s first “i” brand EV, will cease production later this summer. Even so, the quirky little compact can go out with its head held high, because the electric future it predict…

title: Friday Afternoon’s Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades: Apple, Gilead, Goldman Sachs, Kroger, Raymond James, and More
description: Friday afternoon's top analyst upgrades and downgrades included Apple, Gilead, Goldman Sachs, Kroger, Raymond James, and more.

title: Here's Why That $25,000 Tesla Isn't Coming

title: It’s Going To Be OK — No $25k Tesla Doesn’t Mean No $25k EVs

title: Daimler diventa Mercedes-Benz. Basterà per la grande scalata in Borsa?
description: Obiettivo: essere considerata una tech company e migliorare i multipli. La casa di Stoccarda sarà vista dagli investitori come un player della nuova ondata elettrica al pari di Tesla?

title: Lucid: Lean Into The Fear
description: Shares of Lucid went through a 56% drop in pricing since November. After the drop, the EV maker has a more attractive valuation. Read more on LCID stock here.

title: Маск раскритиковал высказывания Байдена
description:
Американский предприниматель, основатель компаний Tesla и SpaceX Илон Маск раскритиковал президента США Джо Байдена. По мнению миллиардера, президент недооценивает граждан своей страны, сообщает телеканал "360".

title: Tech's Friday rally can't stop the skid: Nasdaq heads for first five-week losing streak since 2012
description: Apple's uplifting results boosted the Nasdaq on Friday, but not enough to keep the index from dropping for a fifth straight week.
